Class Cell

java.lang.Object
Cell
Direct Known Subclasses:
CellConway, CellImmigration, CellSchelling
public abstract class Cell extends Object
Abstract class which represents the skeleton for a cell.

      public abstract ArrayList<int[]> nextState(ArrayList<Cell> neighbours)
      Abstract method which gives the next state of the cell, depending on the game.
      Parameters:
      neighbours - List of the cell's neighbours.
      Returns:
      List of new states of the cells after a step of the game.
